title: SE Double Mouth Pin Vise - 841DH
features: Drills holes, holds items, and more
Can be used as hand drill
Great for beading, wire wrapping, jewelry making, and more
description: The SE 841DH Double Mouth Pin Vise pins items together by drilling holes in both pieces and connecting them with a small piece of wire, and drills holes in plastic and metal. You can use it as a hand drill as well. It also holds drill bits, screws, solder wire, reamers, and more. This item can be used for beading, wire wrapping, sewing, crafts, art, jewelry making, and more. The hexagonal heads allow it to remain in place on a surface.
SE is committed to providing the customer with the best source for value possible on the market. You will enjoy the quality, function and usefulness of our SE 841DH Double Mouth Pin Vise.
Important: Avoid getting counterfeit items. Genuine SE products come with the SE logo on the packaging.
